abilityDescription: Mocks everything and everyone, yet constantly wonders why no one gets the joke. This ability grants infinite sarcasm but zero self-awareness.
attackDescription: Wields the viral tweet 'how do you change your whole personality' like a confused existential dagger that stabs itself repeatedly, leaving foes equally baffled and unimpressed.
description: This user is a lowbie with moderate engagement but no real solid niche, often posting self-deprecating and somewhat awkward existential humor, which fits the 'cringe' type well. The ability mocks their constant satire and ambiguity. The attack references their most liked tweet about changing personality, highlighting their awkward self-exploration. Given their apparently sarcastic and sometimes confusing style, they resist psyop (mind games) but are weak to sharp roasts that cut through their self-proclaimed satire and sarcasm. The HP is on the lower side reflecting their low tier status and modest follower count.
